data.title: Catholic Cemeteries & Funeral Services - Archdiocese of Toronto - TORONTO ON
data.text:
elevated r6D9a July 16, 1939 ~ March 11, 2020

elevated r6D9a Funeral Mass

Saturday, March 14, 2020 at 10:30 a.m.

elevated r6D9a St. Anthony of Padua Catholic Church

940 North Park Drive, Brampton, Ontario L6S 3L5

elevated r6D9a A private cremation to follow

elevated r6D9a Donations

In lieu of flowers, donations may be made in her memory to St. Anthony of Padua Mission Aid

elevated r6D9a Obituary

Passed away peacefully surrounded by her family on March 11, 2020. Beloved wife of Patrick for 53 years. Devoted mother and mother-in-law of Patricia and John Digby, Richard and Kathleen D’Souza, Kevin and Bianca D’Souza, Maria and Jason Mills, Teresa and Ryan Mendes. Cherished Nana of Elyse, Lauren, Samira, Chantal, Olivia, Reid, Calista, Benjamin, Cameron, Christopher, Emmett, and Isabella. Dear sister and sister-in-law of Sonny and Poma, Amy and Josie, Mathilda and Denis, Michael, Anthony and Lynn, Monica and Joe, Valley and Sandra, Marie and Henry. She will be deeply missed by all of her extended family and friends.

elevated r6D9a Mom will be fondly remembered by all who knew her as a practical person with a wonderful sense of humour. Her strong faith enabled her to advocate for all churches to offer a 7:30 a.m. Mass so people could start their day in the presence of the Blessed Sacrament. Mom made humility and simplicity a way of life. She was authentic and placed love for family and God as a priority. Mom was brave, she was resilient, innovative and she put passion and vigor into every day.

elevated r6D9a “Give love to your children, to a wife or husband, to a next door neighbour.” Mother Teresa

elevated r6D9a
